subject: Re: [STATUS] svn-bzr mirrors updating every 15 minutes now
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Volker Lendecke wrote:
> On Tue, May 22, 2007 at 09:27:56AM -0500, Gerald (Jerry) Carter wrote:
>> I increased the frequency of the mirrors from twice an hour
>> to 4 times an hour.  For reference, the anonymous svn mirror
>> is updated every 5 minutes.
> 
> Thanks for your effort here!

yep, thanks for my side as well.

Guenther
